title: SmokePing LXC
textContent:
SmokePing LXC 
                SmokePing
                    is a
                    deluxe latency measurement tool. It can measure, store and display latency, latency distribution and
                    packet loss.
                To create a new Proxmox VE SmokePing LXC, run the command below in the Proxmox VE Shell.
                Copybash -c "$(wget -qLO - https://github.com/community-scripts/ProxmoxVE/raw/main/ct/smokeping.sh)"
                ⚡ Default Settings: 512MiB RAM - 2GB Storage - 1vCPU ⚡
                SmokePing Interface: IP/smokeping
outerHTML:
SmokePing LXC

SmokePing is a deluxe latency measurement tool. It can measure, store and display latency, latency distribution and packet loss.

To create a new Proxmox VE SmokePing LXC, run the command below in the Proxmox VE Shell.

bash -c "$(wget -qLO - https://github.com/community-scripts/ProxmoxVE/raw/main/ct/smokeping.sh)"

⚡ Default Settings: 512MiB RAM - 2GB Storage - 1vCPU ⚡

SmokePing Interface: IP/smokeping
